subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Gigi Marvin set up all three of Meghan Duggan’s goals to lead the United States into the championship game of the Hockey Canada Cup with a 4-0 victory over Finland.
snippet: Gigi Marvin set up all three of Meghan Duggan’s goals to lead the United States into the championship game of the Hockey Canada Cup with a 4-0 victory over Finland.
